TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumberSubstitution extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定如何用不同的区域性显示文本中的数字。

span.span: Specifies how numbers in text are displayed in different cultures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数区域性使用 decimal 系统来表示数字，但多个区域性使用不同的数字的形状。Most cultures use the decimal system to represent numbers, but many cultures use different digit shapes. 下表显示了几种不同的区域性使用的编号方案。The following table shows several numbering systems used by different cultures. ![数字备用标志符号表](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "数字备用标志符号表")![Table of number substitution glyphs](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "Table of number substitution glyphs") 不同的区域性中的数字的外观示例Example of the appearance of digits in different cultures 它不足以为每个组数字形状，提供备用的 Unicode 码位，因为与不同的是字母、 数字计算中使用。It is not sufficient to provide alternate Unicode code points for each set of digit shapes, because, unlike letters, digits are used in calculations. 每个应用程序、 每个操作系统，以及每个运行时库都包含代码专门用于将内部的二进制格式数字值转换为字符串，反之亦然。Every application, every operating system, and every run-time library contains code dedicated to converting an internal binary format numeric value to a string of characters, and vice versa. 这些转换例程被编码以便使用 Unicode 数字"0030"至"0039"。These conversion routines are coded to use Unicode digits "0030" through "0039". 类提供的功能，允许不同的区域性用于在呈现时替换相应的数字形状。The class provides functionality that allows different cultures to substitute the appropriate digit shapes at rendering time. 此功能是类似于用于提供字体替换和呈现语言相关字体。This functionality is similar to the one used for providing font substitution and language dependent font rendering. > [!NOTE] > 多个区域性正在放弃其传统数字形状，并采用西方数字形状，因此，数字替换功能识别为每个区域性传统数字形状和国际标准数字形状之间的区别。Many cultures are discarding their traditional digits shapes and adopting Western digits shapes, therefore the number substitution functionality recognizes the distinction for each culture between traditional digit shapes and national standard digit shapes. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 此类型通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]为对象元素。This type is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an object element. 但是，该类型公开可以包含文本内容的其他对象元素设置的多个附加的属性。However, the type exposes several attached properties that can be set on other object elements that have text content.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识在 属性的值设置为 时要使用的区域性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies which culture to use when the value of the property is set to .

value.span: 表示用作重写的区域性的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the culture that is used as an override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值属性是`null`，它解释为"en-我们"（美国英语） 区域性。The default value of the property is `null`, which is interpreted as the "en-us" (United States English) culture. 如果未设置为，将忽略此属性。If is not set to , this property is ignored. 此参考页表示为两个具有相同名称但不是完全等效用法属性：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 可以设置此属性在代码中的实例，作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]属性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property. 在这种用法，该属性不受依赖项属性标识符，它由私有字段，并不能充当依赖项属性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 可以将此属性设置为中的附加的属性用法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 附加的属性用法是此属性具有一个依赖属性信息的部分原因，因为附加的属性由依赖属性标识符。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并`<`*对象* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*值*`".../>`，其中*对象*是对象元素，其中指定的数字替换逻辑应用，并*值*是字符串格式值之一，如 XAML 值中所述。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于确定数字替换的区域性值的源。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies the source of the culture value that is used to determine number substitution.
An enumerated value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值属性是，这是文本运行的区域性。The default value of the property is , which is the culture of the text run. 此参考页表示为两个具有相同名称但不是完全等效用法属性：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 可以设置此属性在代码中的实例，作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]属性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property. 在这种用法，该属性不受依赖项属性标识符，它由私有字段，并不能充当依赖项属性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 可以将此属性设置为中的附加的属性用法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 附加的属性用法是此属性具有一个依赖属性信息的部分原因，因为附加的属性由依赖属性标识符。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并`<`*对象* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**`="`*值*`".../>`，其中*对象*是对象元素，其中指定的数字替换逻辑应用，并*值*的字符串表示形式是值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is a string representation of a value. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**=""/>\<*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值标识用于确定数字替换的替换方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies the substitution method that is used to determine number substitution.
An enumerated value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值属性是，它指定应确定替换方法根据数字区域性的属性值。The default value of the property is , which specifies that the substitution method should be determined based on the number culture's property value. 此参考页表示为两个具有相同名称但不是完全等效用法属性：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 可以设置此属性在代码中的实例，作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]属性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property. 在这种用法，该属性不受依赖项属性标识符，它由私有字段，并不能充当依赖项属性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 可以将此属性设置为中的附加的属性用法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 附加的属性用法是此属性具有一个依赖属性信息的部分原因，因为附加的属性由依赖属性标识符。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并`<`*对象* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**`="`*值*`".../>`，其中*对象*是对象元素，其中指定的数字替换逻辑应用，并*值*的字符串表示形式是值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is a string representation of a value. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**=""/>\<*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**=""/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
